levels.name: Tutorial
levels.blurb: Learn how to shoot your cannon
description: Your humble beginnings, where you learn how to aim and fire your cannon at your target.

levels.name: Level 1
description: You've just completed your training and you are being thrown in the deep end!
Dr Flame is serious menace to society who is often trying to rob the local jewellery store with fireworks and other pyrotechnics.
You're the only one in the vicinity with the capabilities to stop him. Good luck.
